title: Push Nasus
body:
Can Riot pls end Push-Nasus, 
maybe nerf e basedmg, give it higher manacosts,
I find he is really a boring lane opponent and takes depth out of the game. He punishes other Toplaner who try to work in a team.

replies.body: Maybe you find consolation in the fact that Push-Nasus is actually less succesful at winning games compared to the Classical Stack-Nasus. The new playstyle is not better, it's just simpler and (as lane opponent) more annoying.
